item.title: Home Access over VPN
item.description: How to configure access to computer behind NAT Network using OpenVPN. Requirements: Linux server with root access preferable CentOS 7 Basic bash knowledge Let’s start! Server configuration part Login to our VPN Server ssh root@<server> Install additional epel repository yum -y install epel-release Make some updates yum -y update && yum -y upgrade Stop firewalld systemctl stop firwalld Disable firwalld systemctl disable firwalld Start iptables systemctl start iptables Enable iptables systemctl enable iptables Now we have needed iptables up and running for further access controlling.
